target.echo: #!/usr/bin/env bash set -euo pipefail DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)" JAR="${DIR}/order-worker.jar" PORT="${PORT:-8090}" TEMPORAL_ADDRESS="${TEMPORAL_ADDRESS:-localhost:7233}" JAVA_OPTS="${JAVA_OPTS:-}" mkdir -p "${DIR}/logs" TS="$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S)" LOG_FILE="${DIR}/logs/order-worker.${TS}.log" nohup java ${JAVA_OPTS} -Dserver.port="${PORT}" -Dserver.address=0.0.0.0 -Dtemporal.server.address="${TEMPORAL_ADDRESS}" -jar "${JAR}" >"${LOG_FILE}" 2>&1 & echo $! > "${DIR}/app.pid" echo "Started order-worker on port ${PORT}, Temporal: ${TEMPORAL_ADDRESS}. Logs: ${LOG_FILE} (PID $(cat ${DIR}/app.pid))"

@echo off setlocal set "DIR=%~dp0" set "JAR=%DIR%order-worker.jar" if "%PORT%"=="" set PORT=8090 if "%TEMPORAL_ADDRESS%"=="" set TEMPORAL_ADDRESS=localhost:7233 set "JAVA_OPTS=%JAVA_OPTS%" set "LOGDIR=%DIR%logs" if not exist "%LOGDIR%" mkdir "%LOGDIR%" for /f %%i in ('powershell -NoProfile -Command "(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd-HHmmss')"') do set TS=%%i set "LOGFILE=%LOGDIR%\order-worker.%TS%.log" powershell -NoProfile -Command ^ "$ErrorActionPreference='Stop';" ^ "$dir = (Get-Item -LiteralPath '%DIR%').FullName;" ^ "$jar = Join-Path $dir 'order-worker.jar';" ^ "$port = $env:PORT; if (-not $port) { $port = '8090' }" ^ "$temporal = $env:TEMPORAL_ADDRESS; if (-not $temporal) { $temporal = 'localhost:7233' }" ^ "$javaOpts = $env:JAVA_OPTS;" ^ "$args = @(); if ($javaOpts) { $args += $javaOpts -split ' ' }" ^ "$args += ('-Dserver.port=' + $port); $args += '-Dserver.address=0.0.0.0'; $args += ('-Dtemporal.server.address=' + $temporal); $args += '-jar'; $args += $jar;" ^ "$log = Join-Path $dir ('logs\\order-worker.' + (Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd-HHmmss') + '.log');" ^ "$p = Start-Process -FilePath 'java' -ArgumentList $args -RedirectStandardOutput $log -RedirectStandardError $log -PassThru -WindowStyle Hidden;" ^ "$p.Id | Out-File -Encoding ascii (Join-Path $dir 'app.pid');" ^ "Write-Output ('Started order-worker PID ' + $p.Id + ' Port ' + $port + ' Temporal ' + $temporal + ' Logs ' + $log)" endlocal

#!/usr/bin/env bash set -euo pipefail DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)" PID_FILE="$DIR/app.pid" JAR="$DIR/order-worker.jar" if [[ -f "$PID_FILE" ]]; then PID="$(cat "$PID_FILE")" || true; else PID=""; fi if [[ -n "${PID}" ]] && ps -p "$PID" >/dev/null 2>&1; then kill "$PID" || true for i in {1..20}; do ps -p "$PID" >/dev/null 2>&1 || break; sleep 0.5; done ps -p "$PID" >/dev/null 2>&1 && kill -9 "$PID" || true echo "Stopped PID $PID" else echo "No PID file or process not running; trying by jar match" pkill -f "$JAR" || true fi

@echo off setlocal set "DIR=%~dp0" set "JAR=%DIR%order-worker.jar" set "PIDFILE=%DIR%app.pid" if exist "%PIDFILE%" ( for /f "usebackq delims=" %%p in ("%PIDFILE%") do set PID=%%p if not "%PID%"=="" ( taskkill /PID %PID% /T >nul 2>&1 if errorlevel 1 taskkill /PID %PID% /T /F >nul 2>&1 echo Stopped PID %PID% endlocal & exit /b 0 ) ) echo PID not found; attempting match by JAR powershell -NoProfile -Command ^ "$jar=[IO.Path]::GetFullPath('%JAR%');" ^ "$procs = Get-CimInstance Win32_Process | Where-Object { $_.CommandLine -like ('*' + $jar + '*') };" ^ "if ($procs) { $procs | ForEach-Object { try { Stop-Process -Id $_.ProcessId -Force -PassThru | Out-Null } catch {} }; exit 0 } else { Write-Output 'No matching process found'; exit 1 }" endlocal
